attribute.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container. Caution: The component itself is not a naming container
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit. The default value for this property is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Inline attribute to be used for small amounts of Source code. If it is set it takes precedence over the other attributes for source.
attribute.name: source

attribute.description: An additional description to be rendered as an preceding <p> element
attribute.name: description

attribute.description: The maximum number of characters to be displayed in a line. Defaults to '96', minimum is '32'
attribute.name: maxLineLength

attribute.description: The path to the source code. It takes precedence over #sourceContainerId. It can be either a fully qualified path, like '/META-INF/pages/documentation/portal/portal_templates.xhtml' or a relative path like 'portal_templates.xhtml'. The implementation checks for '/' in order to decide whether it is an relative path or not. All relative addressed files are assumed to be found under '/META-INF/'.
attribute.name: sourcePath

attribute.description: The id of the container wrapping the source to be displayed. It is assumed that it resides on the current view. Caution: It is not the clientId but the actual id-Attribute on the view
attribute.name: sourceContainerId

attribute.description: The type of the source code, needed for proper formatting. Defaults to 'lang-html'. Must be one of 'lang-html', 'lang-java', 'lang-sql', 'lang-js', 'lang-css', 'lang-yaml', 'lang-properties'.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: The (optional) description for the sourceCode to be displayed.
attribute.name: description

attribute.description: Indicates whether to render 'Copy to Clipboard' functionality. Defaults to true
attribute.name: enableClipboard
